website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are looking for a unique way to apply eyeliner and like the idea of very long wear. Removing it can be challenging, however.
pros: Cream formula goes on easily without any tugging or pulling
Deeply pigmented color is ideal for those who like dramatic looks
cons: Takes time to learn how to apply it properly
Difficult to remove, and the tube can be a bit messy

customer_reviews.title: Be weary if you have oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I read some good reviews on this so I tried it and i loved it, in the beginning. The lines were really dark, defined and precise. Then at the end of the day, when I got home and looked in the mirror, i had sort of racoon eyes. Yep, it smeared. I guess it does say clay based but I didn't expect it to smear/smudge even after setting it with setting spray. Well you can't win them all. Great concept though!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Smilez

customer_reviews.title: Tarteist eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: So i have been using a mechanical black eye liner for the longest time, not the greatest person to use a brush and and top of that liquid...I decided to research this product a bit more on you tube as it came highly recommended and I ended up buying it. Best decision ever!!! Apart from being really black, its is so smooth, which helps a rookie like me when it comes to applying. The brush is not flimsy like other eye liner brushes, which helps a rookie like me keep the line straight. It literally feels creamy when applying. Its the best eye liner product that I have ever owned. Watch you tube, see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra R.

customer_reviews.title: My niece is a make up artist and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece is a make up artist and she loves this! Its the only product she uses now for eye liner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item not good
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed, I ordered this item Feb 10 and bearly tried to use it today. I don't know if it was an old product but when I squeezed it and tried to use it, this product had nothing but like an oil texture. It was airy, when I squeezed it nothing but oily texture came out. No eyeliner at all. I need my money back.
customer_reviews.author: claudia valencia

customer_reviews.title: bad quality, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: this is for someone who wants to spend 30 minutes on their eyeliner alone and have thick, violently black streaks as a result. the product was dry and flakey and gooey, rather than smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This just didn’t stay on like I hoped. I like a liner that do not start moving shortly after being applied. I thought for the price and the high recommendation that it would be legit. Not satisfied at all. The tub and brush were cute and the cold on black packaging is very eye catching.
customer_reviews.author: Sori Vin

customer_reviews.title: Tends to Smear
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly, but like most eyeliner, tends to smear. Kat Von D Tattoo Liner is Awesome. Does not come off unless you take it off. Also sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Always Learning

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the eyeliner exploded out of the tube when pressure was applied. the company would not back up their product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dow

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best. Better then the ink pots
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best. Better then the ink pots. It stains on the skin but that won't stop me from purchasing it again
customer_reviews.author: babydoll

customer_reviews.title: I bought this eyeliner thinking it was waterproof by the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyeliner thinking it was waterproof by the middle of the day it was smeared all over my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Behm

customer_reviews.title: Gave this a try and at the end of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a try and at the end of the day it’s smeared at the corners of my eye and it gets into the creases of my lids.... Not impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mouton {Dee}

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Stupid Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but the packaging is just plain stupid and wasteful. If you stick the liner brush into the little hole in the tube, the brush frays and you don't get a nice line. If you squeeze the tube, it squirts across the room because you have to squeeze really, really hard to get any out. It's unfortunate because I love the eyeliner product, but because the packaging is so frustrating ..... I won't be purchasing this again. Plenty of other good ones out there without the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Dried up
customer_reviews.text: Eyeliner was old and dried up - very disappointed. 32.00 - I should have bought at mall instead.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Small amount
customer_reviews.text: Does not contain enough product to last a month. For the price
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  almost empty tube.
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice easy to use but the tube came with hardly any product in it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Consla

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Looked used, makeup built up under cap and brush stained black already.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad But it's not easy to remove it's good for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad But it's not easy to remove it's good for people likes permanent make up
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this eyeliner as it goes on dark. Not waterproof as stated
customer_reviews.author: Bianca R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this eyeliner but there's not much in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Here’s my consensus Pros: creates a beautiful black line and perfect wing Stays put— once it dries Cons: Again it stays put! This liner is not going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Krystn Tyde

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I got mascara that's was dried out never the less. I ordered eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Krissy Beck

customer_reviews.title: TBH.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest the eyeliner is not worth it for the price, just buy the brush & buy the loreal gel liner. Cheaper & better & if you want it to last longer buy Nyx setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it was better
customer_reviews.text: I wish the opening was better instead of having to squeeze it out. Seems to stay on well. I have found better liners but it will do for now. Needs to be in a pot so you can dip brush in.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for an amazing black eyeliner and i though this was it after reading the reviews. It doesn't last as long as i thought it would. Definitely need to reapply during the day. Kinda disappointed in this
customer_reviews.author: Angela Greco

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not like that you have to use a lot to get a dark pigment
customer_reviews.author: Christina Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner. Better than the ones in the pot!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and it's the only liquid eyeliner that I can't live without. I complement it with a precision liner for sharp wings. The best thing about this is that it stays put. No matter the heat or sweat, the liner will not transfer to my lids. The little brush is handy and is great for thicker wings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed... brush is ok, rubs off
customer_reviews.text: The brush can use some improving. I give this product a 3 stars only because it rubs off onto my lower lid and under the eye after a long day. My marker eyeliner never rubs off underneath my eye even after a 9 hour day at the office.
customer_reviews.author: azeriqueen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! the little brush that is comes with works perfectly! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabie

customer_reviews.title: whelp not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Where I live water proof eye liner is a must, super wet over here, with that being said I bought this item for that reason. I was told by many people that this was the eyeliner for that job. whelp it runs and smudges everywhere, my eye lid has dark rings around them, the sides leaves blobs of black stains, I look like I've been crying for months. Also irritates the crap out of my eyes. Ugh its itches and burns. Other than those thing, If you good with brushes it's easy to apply on, it is not meant for someone who is new at make-up, the pigment is the only nice thing about this eyeliner. will be returning soon
customer_reviews.author: vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner would be great if it lasted. I have no problems with either eyeliners or eyeshadows from other companies, but this one is terrible. It lasts for an hour before it starts transferring and giving me racoon eyes, and using it with a primer or setting it with eyeshadows makes no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Crying for hours and still stayed put
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, I broke up with my bf after 2 years together. I've been crying since 0800- it's 1300 now. And the eyeliner is still there. Unlike my now ex boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing! Although there's no way I would pay $35 ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing! Although there's no way I would pay $35 for it here. $24 REGULAR PRICE AT SEPHORA, ULTA, and even the Tarte website with only about $3 for shipping. Other than that... you won't be disappointed. The brush works great too but I use an old favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Pros Cons dark Not as long lasting Creamy Easy to apply Overall it stays on a pretty good ammount of time and still one of my favorites because of how dark it is and the application.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: BEST ONE YET BUT OVER PRICED ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I love mine bought it same day it released at ULTA on 07/24/2015 so the deal was for $24.99 but I had ULTA points so got it for $20.00 goes on creamy and dries on matte reason for 3 star is they are over pricing it on here but love the eyeliner don't really use the brush it came with however I use a japonesque one I got for free for buying a brush at ULTA AND IT DOES LAST LONG !!!
customer_reviews.author: carla soto

customer_reviews.title: It does go on smoothly and the brush that it comes with makes it easy for me to apply
customer_reviews.text: I bought mines at Sephora. I had high expectations for this brand. It's not a cheap eyeliner. It does go on smoothly and the brush that it comes with makes it easy for me to apply. However, it does not last. By the middle of the work day, the eyeliner smudged and I have panda eyes. I liked Koji Dolly Wink Liquid Eyeliner much better. It lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Chaney

product_meta.title: Tarte Tarteist Clay Paint Waterproof Eye Liner- Black Full Size w/Angled Brush
